amendment.description: To increase the amount set aside for the breastfeeding peer counselors program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3668 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3668 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Casey to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5502) To increase the amount set aside for the breastfeeding peer counselors program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3668 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Casey to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3668 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
